trans-unit.source: Provides the logic to establish a timer and to wait, asynchronously, for timer's expiration.
trans-unit.target: 提供建立計時器和非同步等待計時器逾時的邏輯。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: When notified that its timer has expired, a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> completes its execution.
trans-unit.target: 當通知其計時器逾時，<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> 會完成其執行。

trans-unit.source: You can set a time out on the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> so that your workflow pauses before resuming execution.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> 上設定逾時，讓您的工作流程會先暫停，然後再繼續執行。

trans-unit.source: You specify the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> using <xref:System.TimeSpan>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> 指定 <xref:System.TimeSpan>。

trans-unit.source: This causes your workflow to pause until the specified <xref:System.TimeSpan> has elapsed.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致您的工作流程暫停，一直到經過指定的 <xref:System.TimeSpan> 為止。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> class runs the code method associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.InitializeTimeoutDuration> event before the activity starts and the code-beside method can be used to initialize the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> 類別先執行與 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.InitializeTimeoutDuration> 事件相關聯的程式碼方法之後，活動才會開始，並使用程式碼除外的方法初始化 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> is guaranteed to complete no sooner than the indicated <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> 保證一指定 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> 便立即完成。

trans-unit.source: The delay can take longer because the timer notification might occur some time after the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> is reached.
trans-unit.target: 延遲時間較長，因為計時器通知會在達到 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> 一段時間後發生。

trans-unit.source: One reason for a longer delay is if the workflow is running under high system stress in a server environment.
trans-unit.target: 延遲較長的另一個原因是，工作流程是在伺服器環境中的高系統壓力下執行。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK Sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是 StateMachineWorkflow.cs 檔案中＜SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK＞範例的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Simple State Machine.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱＜簡單狀態機器＞。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何初始化 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK Sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是 StateMachineWorkflow.cs 檔案中＜SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK＞範例的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Simple State Machine](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[簡單狀態機器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e)。

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的活動名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 使用活動的名稱，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the time-out duration starts.
trans-unit.target: 在逾時持續期間開始之前發生。

trans-unit.source: This event should not be used to set the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> for a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件不可以用於設定 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> 的 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>。

trans-unit.source: The time-out duration should be set in the workflow's `InitializeComponent` method instead.
trans-unit.target: 逾時持續期間應該改成用工作流程的 `InitializeComponent` 方法設定。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.InitializeTimeoutDuration" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 表示目標為 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> 事件的 <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.InitializeTimeoutDuration" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the workflow queue that will be delivered when the timer expires.
trans-unit.target: 取得工作流程佇列的名稱，該名稱會在計時器逾時傳遞。

trans-unit.source: The name of the workflow queue.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程佇列的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the workflow queue is set by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程佇列的名稱是由 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> 方法所設定。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> that represents the execution environment of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的執行環境。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> for the parent event.
trans-unit.target: 父事件的 <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates the subscription of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" /> to an event.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" /> 對事件的訂閱。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="parentContext" /> or <paramref name="parentEventHandler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parentContext" /> 或 <paramref name="parentEventHandler" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> that represents the execution environment of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的執行環境。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> for the parent event.
trans-unit.target: 父事件的 <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" />。

trans-unit.source: Cancels the subscription of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" /> to an event.
trans-unit.target: 取消 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity" /> 對事件的訂閱。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="parentContext" /> or <paramref name="parentEventHandler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parentContext" /> 或 <paramref name="parentEventHandler" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The object that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件的物件。

trans-unit.source: The previously typed event arguments.
trans-unit.target: 之前輸入的事件引數。

trans-unit.source: Defines the processing procedure when the subscribed-to event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 定義發生訂閱事件時的處理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the duration of the delay in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 取得和設定工作流程中延遲的持續期間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that indicates the length of the delay in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，指出工作流程中延遲的長度。

trans-unit.source: The time period set in this property determines the time the workflow will sit idle before the workflow proceeds to the next activity.
trans-unit.target: 在這個屬性中設定的期間可判斷工作流程繼續下一個活動之前，工作流程閒置的時間。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> property to 3 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何將 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> 屬性的值設為 3 秒。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes that `delay2` is of type <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>.
trans-unit.target: 這段程式碼假設 `delay2` 的型別為 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK Sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是 StateMachineWorkflow.cs 檔案中＜SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK＞範例的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Simple State Machine](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[簡單狀態機器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e)。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 表示目標為 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> 屬性的 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDurationProperty> field.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDurationProperty> 欄位。
